tooltip: Select Ashei as your hero of choice.

heroSelectionDescriptionElements.tooltipText: Ashei focuses on hiring Mercenary units.
Allows you to summon Ashei, a Mercenary hero that attacks with her sword.
A second Hero that Ashei can summon, composed of Telma, Shad, and Auru.
Additional mercenairies are available in Taverns.
Taverns generate a trickle of rupees
